sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>sun</radical> is being blocked by a <radical>rain</radical> <radical>cloud</radical>, making it <kanji>cloudy</kanji>.
meaningInfo: You look up at the sky, trying to find the sun, but it's so cloudy that you can't even find where the sun should be.
readingMnemonic: Remember <ja>雲</ja>? It means "cloud" and has the same reading as "cloudy," making them both <ja><reading>くも</reading></ja>.
readingInfo: If it's cloudy there are clouds, so if you can read one, you can read the other!
